text: Jonathan Murray Chu (born November 2, 1979) is an American movie and television director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known as the director of 2018's Crazy Rich Asians. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:Screenwriters from California Category:People from Palo Alto, California
title: Jon M. Chu
